name: A-Mazing-Land
description:
You're in a maze full of doors. Escape the almost endless maze by finding the keys to unlock the doors that match the colour of the key!

This is a re-make of my very old game I once made for a Ludum Dare game jam thich was very simple and 2D. This is also my first time ever using the Godot engine so it was quite a learning curve, but tbh it's a great engine.

Controls:
WASD for movement and SHIFT to sprint. Use the mouse to look around.

The current record for completing the game stands at 5:42.50! (set by me)

Note:

If the HTML file doesn't load, please try downloading the build.
